sqlMap.select: select MSCID, VENDOR, REGION, MSU_CAPACITY, TYPE, LOCATION, MSC_AUTH_SR, MSC_CIPH_SR, MSC_PAGE_SR, MSC_LU_SR, MSC_CSSR, MSC_GSM_GSM_HO_SR, MSC_GSM_UMTS_HO_SR, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LOCATION_NAME, DEPT, MSC_INTRA2G_HO_SR, MSC_INTER2G_HO_SR, MSC_INTRA3G_HO_SR, MSC_INTER3G_HO_SR, SUB_TEAM, TEAM, NE_GROUP, ID from H_MSC where MSCID = #mscid:VARCHAR#

sqlMap.update:
update H_MSC
VENDOR = #vendor:VARCHAR#
REGION = #region:VARCHAR#
MSU_CAPACITY = #msuCapacity:DECIMAL#
TYPE = #type:VARCHAR#
LOCATION = #location:VARCHAR#
MSC_AUTH_SR = #mscAuthSr:DECIMAL#
MSC_CIPH_SR = #mscCiphSr:DECIMAL#
MSC_PAGE_SR = #mscPageSr:DECIMAL#
MSC_LU_SR = #mscLuSr:DECIMAL#
MSC_CSSR = #mscCssr:DECIMAL#
MSC_GSM_GSM_HO_SR = #mscGsmGsmHoSr:DECIMAL#
MSC_GSM_UMTS_HO_SR = #mscGsmUmtsHoSr:DECIMAL#
LONGITUDE = #longitude:VARCHAR#
LATITUDE = #latitude:VARCHAR#
LOCATION_NAME = #locationName:VARCHAR#
DEPT = #dept:VARCHAR#
MSC_INTRA2G_HO_SR = #mscIntra2gHoSr:DECIMAL#
MSC_INTER2G_HO_SR = #mscInter2gHoSr:DECIMAL#
MSC_INTRA3G_HO_SR = #mscIntra3gHoSr:DECIMAL#
MSC_INTER3G_HO_SR = #mscInter3gHoSr:DECIMAL#
SUB_TEAM = #subTeam:VARCHAR#
TEAM = #team:VARCHAR#
NE_GROUP = #neGroup:VARCHAR#
where MSCID = #mscid:VARCHAR#

update H_MSC set VENDOR = #vendor:VARCHAR#, REGION = #region:VARCHAR#, MSU_CAPACITY = #msuCapacity:DECIMAL#, TYPE = #type:VARCHAR#, LOCATION = #location:VARCHAR#, MSC_AUTH_SR = #mscAuthSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_CIPH_SR = #mscCiphSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_PAGE_SR = #mscPageSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_LU_SR = #mscLuSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_CSSR = #mscCssr:DECIMAL#, MSC_GSM_GSM_HO_SR = #mscGsmGsmHoSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_GSM_UMTS_HO_SR = #mscGsmUmtsHoSr:DECIMAL#, LONGITUDE = #longitude:VARCHAR#, LATITUDE = #latitude:VARCHAR#, LOCATION_NAME = #locationName:VARCHAR#, DEPT = #dept:VARCHAR#, MSC_INTRA2G_HO_SR = #mscIntra2gHoSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_INTER2G_HO_SR = #mscInter2gHoSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_INTRA3G_HO_SR = #mscIntra3gHoSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_INTER3G_HO_SR = #mscInter3gHoSr:DECIMAL#, SUB_TEAM = #subTeam:VARCHAR#, TEAM = #team:VARCHAR#, NE_GROUP = #neGroup:VARCHAR# where MSCID = #mscid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select * from H_MSC
UPPER(MSCID) like '%' || UPPER(#mscid:VARCHAR#) || '%'
VENDOR = #vendor:VARCHAR#
UPPER(LOCATION) like '%' || UPPER(#location:VARCHAR#) || '%'
UPPER(TYPE) like '%' || UPPER(#type:VARCHAR#) || '%'
order by MSCID asc
select * from H_MSC order by MSCID asc
select MSCID from H_MSC where MSCID like '%' || UPPER(#value#) || '%' order by MSCID asc

select MSCID, VENDOR, REGION, MSU_CAPACITY, TYPE, LOCATION, MSC_AUTH_SR, MSC_CIPH_SR, MSC_PAGE_SR, MSC_LU_SR, MSC_CSSR, MSC_GSM_GSM_HO_SR, MSC_GSM_UMTS_HO_SR, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, LOCATION_NAME, DEPT, MSC_INTRA2G_HO_SR, MSC_INTER2G_HO_SR, MSC_INTRA3G_HO_SR, MSC_INTER3G_HO_SR, SUB_TEAM, TEAM, NE_GROUP, ID from H_MSC where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.update: update H_MSC set VENDOR = #vendor:VARCHAR#, REGION = #region:VARCHAR#, MSU_CAPACITY = #msuCapacity:DECIMAL#, TYPE = #type:VARCHAR#, LOCATION = #location:VARCHAR#, MSC_AUTH_SR = #mscAuthSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_CIPH_SR = #mscCiphSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_PAGE_SR = #mscPageSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_LU_SR = #mscLuSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_CSSR = #mscCssr:DECIMAL#, MSC_GSM_GSM_HO_SR = #mscGsmGsmHoSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_GSM_UMTS_HO_SR = #mscGsmUmtsHoSr:DECIMAL#, LONGITUDE = #longitude:VARCHAR#, LATITUDE = #latitude:VARCHAR#, LOCATION_NAME = #locationName:VARCHAR#, DEPT = #dept:VARCHAR#, MSC_INTRA2G_HO_SR = #mscIntra2gHoSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_INTER2G_HO_SR = #mscInter2gHoSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_INTRA3G_HO_SR = #mscIntra3gHoSr:DECIMAL#, MSC_INTER3G_HO_SR = #mscInter3gHoSr:DECIMAL#, SUB_TEAM = #subTeam:VARCHAR#, TEAM = #team:VARCHAR#, NE_GROUP = #neGroup:VARCHAR#, MSCID = #mscid:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
